channel.title: Alert template question
channel.description: I would like to receive email alerts in every 15 minutes which includes the latest results. I know that the query_results_rows contains the results but this format is not transparent. Is it possible to make the format more interpretable?

item.title: Alert template question
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Alerts aren’t really intended for this purpose. There’s no options for formatting at the moment. Although we certain review a PR implementing this.

Read full topic
